examples.chinese: 台灣景氣似乎正在復甦，老闆加薪也變大方了！
examples.translation: Taiwan's economy seems to be recovering, and the boss has become more generous with raises!

examples.chinese: 他談及自己的念書過程，他大方分享經驗、祕訣了！
examples.translation: He talked about his study process and generously shared his experiences and tips!

examples.chinese: 家電最低6折起，贈品大方送！
examples.translation: Home appliances starting at 40% off, plus generous giveaways!
